Explain Intel® Optane™ Technology In Depth
Identify And Explain Best Use Cases
Identify And Recommend Business Applications To Upgrade Solution With Intel® Optane™ Technology
Implement And Deploy Solution With Intel® Optane™ Technology
Recommend Solutions With Intel® Optane™ Technology

fb2920b7-83bd-416f-a6fc-4904a238ef43.description: Earners of this badge are Intel® Technical Ambassador Program member that have demonstrated knowledge, understanding, and proficiency in at least 3 specialized areas of Intel® products, technologies and solutions.
fb2920b7-83bd-416f-a6fc-4904a238ef43.name: Intel® Technical Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of a qualifying Partner in the Intel® Partner Alliance, an invited member of the Intel® Business Client and/or Intel® Data Center Technical Ambassador Programs, completed and/or maintained (3) technical training competencies through Intel® Partner University, and have accepted the terms and conditions for use subject to the Intel Partner Alliance terms and conditions and trademark license.

skills.name: At Least 3 Specialized Areas Of Intel® Products And Technologies And Solutions

f644a6eb-1434-4429-934b-de34674489f0.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge, understanding and proficiency on Intel value proposition for hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI), deployment options, and industry solutions. The skills acquired have prepared them to better drive business value for HCI solutions powered by Intel® platforms, products and technologies.
f644a6eb-1434-4429-934b-de34674489f0.name: Hyperconverged Infrastructure

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must complete at least 3.75 hours of training and successfully pass each of the associated course quizzes. Passing score is 80% or better. Must be an employee of an Intel® Partner Alliance company.

5989ef73-28f3-4908-a9eb-f523ff41bed0.description: The Level4 Lean Leader badge earner can coach and educate people for Lean knowledge and tools, teaching any of the following class: RIL workshop, Kaizen training or scrum training.
5989ef73-28f3-4908-a9eb-f523ff41bed0.name: ATM Lean Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training led by certified instructor; go through the dry run.

RIL Workshop Instructor: 1) active as Rapid Integrated Lean Workshop event co-instructor role for at least 1 time; 2) active as Rapid Integrated Lean Workshop event Lead-instructor role for at least 1 time. Kaizen Training Instructor: 1) Pass the Kaizen training TTT (taught to teach) and pass the certifier test.

b00bddcf-3d60-402c-adef-69fb833dab61.description: Those with the Beginner Intel® FPGA Designer Developer Competency badge have learned the basics of what an FPGA is and can accomplish, the basics of the language used to make an FPGA design, and how to compile an FPGA design. After taking these courses, a beginner FPGA designer can produce a basic FPGA design and load it to the FPGA. They can explain what all the steps in the FPGA design cycle do. Finally, they know when an FPGA is the correct part to use for their needs.
b00bddcf-3d60-402c-adef-69fb833dab61.name: Beginner Workshop for Intel® FPGAs Course Completion

badge_template_activities.title: For this badge, you will complete in entirety the 3-hour Beginner Workshop led by an Intel FPGA Technical Training instructor, which includes approximately 1.5 hours of lecture and 1.5 hours of hands-on lab practice. The hands-on lab practice will be completed during class time, in a virtual machine environment provided by your instructor.

4ce3cb0b-c2be-4c44-aeed-35c973cbc041.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge, understanding, and proficiency in the fundamentals of HPC, workload implications and considerations to recommend/influence optimal HPC solutions based on Intel® products, technologies, software, and solutions.
4ce3cb0b-c2be-4c44-aeed-35c973cbc041.name: Intel - High Performance Computing

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must complete 5 required courses and 7 elective courses and successfully pass each of the associated course quizzes. Passing score is 90% or better. Must be an employee of Intel.

skills.name: 2nd Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Processor For HPC
Influence HPC Deployment On Intel® Architecture And Software

2195b6b4-d606-4de5-9466-ec46bc570e4d.description: Earners of this badge will get a brief introduction to the mission of the Intel Client Computing Group (CCG). Learn about the different market segments served by CCG — commercial, consumer, and enthusiast. Discover what makes a “client” PC and learn the different technologies and platforms that Intel offers for each market segment.
2195b6b4-d606-4de5-9466-ec46bc570e4d.name: Intel® Client Training - Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: The Fundamentals Level 1 curriculum consists of seven courses which will take about 65 minutes to complete. You must be an employee of Intel and achieve an 80% score on each quiz at the end of each course in order to pass and receive credit. Once completed, you’ll be eligible to take courses in the Commercial and all other curriculums.

a3f35610-28e3-4121-8c6b-61f88f6a2461.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge, understanding and proficiency in Intel® FlexRAN™ Reference Architecture to use the open RAN ecosystem to build and deploy highly optimized, feature rich, 4G and 5G scalable cloud-native RAN solutions on Intel® architecture.
a3f35610-28e3-4121-8c6b-61f88f6a2461.name: 5G RAN for Intel® FlexRAN™ Reference Architecture

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must complete 2.5 hours of required training and successfully pass each of the associated course quizzes. Passing score is 80% or better. Must have an NDA in place with Intel® FlexRAN team and be an employee of an Intel® Partner Alliance company.

skills.name: Build and deploy Cloud Native 5G RAN solutions on Intel® architecture
Build an Intel® FlexRAN™ software pipeline Use best known methods for scheduler algorithm optimization on Intel® architecture
Deploy an Intel® FlexRAN™ software pipeline
Deploy Intel® FlexRAN™ Reference Architecture in a container environment
Implement Intel® FlexRAN Reference Architecture for Intel® Xeon® processors with FPGAs
Verify an Intel® FlexRAN™ software pipeline

db005d5b-943b-4273-b160-f64ad88b7a86.description: Earners of the Level2 Lean Expert badge have a deep understanding of the RIL (RIL standards for Rapid Integrated Lean, it is Intel Lean tools including: direct observation, value stream mapping, waste identification, 7 waste, 5 why, root cause identification, variation reduction, etc.) framework and process. They are responsible for leading the team (RIL manager, content expert, decision maker, stakeholder) to solve a problem or improve a process in a short time (normally within 3 weeks).
db005d5b-943b-4273-b160-f64ad88b7a86.name: ATM Lean Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 3 days Rapid Integrated Lean workshop led by instructor.
Completed 3 Rapid Integrated Lean projects with debrief of coach, pass the final interview with certifier.

f9ade6e7-c2da-4f4d-a445-313ab894f93b.description: Earners of the level3 Lean Master badge can solve complex problem across different business group by applying either of advanced lean tools like Kaizen, lego-serious play, or certified as Scrum master, LSSGB etc.
f9ade6e7-c2da-4f4d-a445-313ab894f93b.name: ATM Lean Master

badge_template_activities.title: Complete any of the following classes: Kaizen Facilitator class or Scrum Training Class or Lego-serious Play Class or Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Class led by instructor.

Kaizen Facilitator: 1) follow Intel ATM Kaizen standard training, 2) lead 2 Kaizens to successful completion of the project, 3) pass final certification interview with certifier. LSSGB : 1) follow Intel LSSGB standards (pass all the knowledge tests and lead a project with lean approach, reach to 75k$ saving).

abe6f3e3-db6e-4651-95e3-614b271750f0.description: Earners of the Level1 Lean Practitioner badge have a fundamental understanding of the lean concepts and the entrance level application.
abe6f3e3-db6e-4651-95e3-614b271750f0.name: ATM Lean Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 4 course led by instructor - Class 1: Lean Introduction to ATM; Class 2: Lean Direct Observation; Class 3: A3 problem Solving; Class 4: Lean Standardization

8a7c89c6-181a-4adf-b9c6-81892821a832.description: Earners of this badge will get an introduction to the commercial client PCs and platforms that help make the business owner’s job easier. In this curriculum, you’ll learn to identify the primary functions and capabilities of a business-focused PC. You’ll get an overview of the challenges businesses face in equipping a hybrid workforce with the right device and learn how to offer solutions with the benefits of an Intel vPro® business PC.
8a7c89c6-181a-4adf-b9c6-81892821a832.name: Intel® Client Training - Commercial

badge_template_activities.title: Completing the entire 10-course Commercial Level 1 curriculum requires roughly 150 minutes. You must be an employee of Intel and achieve an 80% score on each quiz at the end of each course in order to pass and receive credit. Once completed, you will be eligible to take Commercial Level 2 courses and above, when they become available.

14f5c7fd-8cf2-4946-afd7-eb7be7b7192d.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge, understanding, and proficiency of Intel Unite® solution to be able to advise and make customer recommendations to drive business and increase revenue selling across verticals and organizations of all sizes.
14f5c7fd-8cf2-4946-afd7-eb7be7b7192d.name: Intel - Intel Unite® Solution

badge_template_activities.title: Learners are required to complete 16 courses and pass the associated quizzes with a score of 90% or better. Must be an employee of an Intel partner company.

skills.name: Deploy And Configure The Intel Unite® Software

195a7dc2-8b82-4656-9ff5-c7e153dd05e8.name: Intel IPU Solution Pro Test Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Template to test functionality in Docebo

06f796ba-2973-4053-8599-9d347e1e3ee8.description: Earners of the Intel(R) oneAPI Technology Partner Badge have been trained on oneAPI and the tools that enable heterogenous computing. Earners will be able to use their Intel oneAPI technical expertise to meet the business and technical needs of their customers and the developer community.
06f796ba-2973-4053-8599-9d347e1e3ee8.name: Intel® oneAPI Technology Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Submit an application to become an Intel(R) oneAPI Technology Partner
Take the required courses to become an Intel® oneAPI Technology Partner. Must complete the oneAPI Essentials plus the required AI or HPC learning plan or both.
Pass the Essentials Assessment (80% or higher); pass either AI or/and HPC assessments (80% or higher).

359a5867-10a4-40c4-b8c4-ef6ce875afa0.description: A forum of Intel Partner Alliance appointed executives to provide insight and advice to Intel on products, industry, and program related topics
359a5867-10a4-40c4-b8c4-ef6ce875afa0.name: Intel Partner Alliance Board of Advisors Member

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in Intel Partner Alliance Board of Advisors

dc4ff254-2323-46d2-85ce-50c5cc1ba4ac.description: The recipients of this badge are the founders of startup companies that have developed differentiated solutions and achieved success at various stages of growth. They have been recognized for their exceptional achievements and selected to be part of the Intel Startup Program. Their recognition as badge recipients is a testament to their exceptional accomplishments and a symbol of their ongoing commitment to driving innovation and growth.
dc4ff254-2323-46d2-85ce-50c5cc1ba4ac.name: Intel Startup Program - Accelerated Venture

badge_template_activities.title: Startup founders associated with Intel Startup Program and are mentored for at least one quarter in both technical and business aspects and/or with IP/technologies aligned with Intel Business Units

90f83468-0a81-4559-8160-e4d51f4f31ca.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their proficiency in AI technology, Iot Applications, design and engineering using the Intel Distribution of OpenVINO toolkit. 该徽章的获得者展示了对AI技术和IoT应用的理解和精通，并展示了使用OpenVINO™工具包的强大设计和工程能力。
90f83468-0a81-4559-8160-e4d51f4f31ca.name: OpenVINO™工具套件领航者联盟（繁体版）

badge_template_activities.title: Earners' projects win the final prize in OpenVINO™design campaigns of Navigator Alliance Assembly Call Series 获奖者的项目在领航者联盟集结号系列OpenVINO™设计大赛中获得决赛奖项
